script_text:
Lily,today is the last day of school.Where are you going in
your winter vacation?
I'm going to Harbin with my parents.I don't like cold weather.
I'm afraid of getting a cold.
Oh,you'll be fine.What are you going to do there?
We're going to see ice lanterns and play in the snow.My
uncle's family live there.We're going to visit them.
Are you going to ski?
Yes.I can't ski now,but I'm going to have skiing lessons.
OK,have a nice winter vacation!
You too!I'm going to bring back some sausages for you!I hear
they are famous in Harbin.
Thank you.

engine_raw.gemini_feedback: 学生的整体语感非常好，语速适中，断句自然，展现了较强的英语口语基础。主要问题在于对‘功能词’（如 to, a）以及‘固定搭配’（如 be going to）的忽略或误用。发音习惯上，元音 /æ/ 的开口度可以再大一点，避免听起来像 /e/。此外，要注意名词单复数与冠词的匹配。
engine_raw.detected_transcript: Lily, today is the last day of school. Where are you going in your winter vacation? I'm going to Harbin with my parents. I don't like cold weather. I'm afraid of getting a cold. Oh, you'll be fine. What are you going to do there? We're going to see ice lanterns and play in the snow. My uncle's family live there. We're going to visit them. Are you going ski? Yes. I can't ski now, but I'm going to have a skiing lessons. OK, have a nice winter vacation! You too! I'm bring back some sausages for you! I hear they are famous in Harbin. Thank you.

conflict_details.comment: 注意 /æ/ 音需要嘴角向两侧拉开，下巴略微下拉。

conflict_details.got: 在 Are you going to ski 处漏读
conflict_details.comment: 漏掉了不定式符号 to。
不要在 skiing 前面加 a，因为后面是复数 lessons。

conflict_details.got: 在 I'm going to bring 处漏读

integrated_feedback.overall_comment: 你的声音非常好听，读起来很有节奏感，像是在真正地对话！你对长句的处理很棒，停顿非常自然。只要在细节上（比如那些不起眼的小单词）再精准一点，你的口语就会非常完美。
specific_suggestions: 练习 'going to' 的连读，可以读成轻快的 /ɡənə/，但不能省略它。
发 'last' 的时候，试着把嘴巴张得像咬苹果一样大，发出饱满的 /æ/。
注意 'lessons' 是复数，前面要把那个多余的 'a' 去掉。
practice_tips: 尝试‘影子练习’（Shadowing），跟着原声模仿那些虚词的弱读和连读。
录下自己读 'be going to' 的句子，检查是否每个单词都读出来了。
integrated_feedback.fun_challenge: 试着挑战用最快的速度说三遍：'I'm going to go skiing in Harbin'，看能不能把 going to 读得既快又准！

top_errors.description: 在 'Are you going to ski' 中漏读了 'to'，听起来像 'Are you going ski'
top_errors.improvement: 在 going 之后要清晰地发出 /tu/ 的音，确保语法结构的完整性。

top_errors.description: 在 'have skiing lessons' 之前多读了一个 'a'，听起来像 'have a skiing lessons'
top_errors.improvement: 注意名词复数 lessons 前面不需要加不定冠词 a。

top_errors.description: 在 'I'm going to bring back' 中漏读了 'going to'，听起来像 'I'm bring back'
top_errors.improvement: 表达将来计划时，'be going to' 是一个整体，不能只读 I'm 而省略 going to。

mistakes.desc: Said '/æ/ 发音略扁，接近 /e/' instead of 'last'

mistakes.got: 在 Are you going to ski 处漏读
mistakes.desc: Said '在 Are you going to ski 处漏读' instead of 'to'

mistakes.got: 在 I'm going to bring 处漏读
mistakes.desc: Said '在 I'm going to bring 处漏读' instead of 'going'

hesitations.desc: 检测到了一些填充词。尝试用停顿代替它们。
tips: 在想说什么的时候，试着深呼吸而不是发出'嗯'的声音。
尝试放慢语速，给自己更多思考时间。

completeness.title: 完整度分析
completeness.insight: 内容覆盖率: 99% (漏读 1 个关键词)
tips: 尝试更仔细地阅读实词（名词、动词），它们承载了句子的核心含义。
